entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
